Keywords: Avengers , Soldier
Real Name: Steve Rogers
Special Powers
AVENGERS ASSEMBLE!: Leadership. // At the beginning of the game, you may replace up to 4 other friendly standard characters with the same number of standard characters from your Sideline on their starting clicks. All replacement and replaced characters must have the Avengers keyword and different names. The total points of the replacement characters can't exceed the total points of the replaced characters.
